alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Itawamba, northeastern Lee and southern Prentiss Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baldwyn, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Baldwyn, Wheeler, Pratts Friendship, Marietta, Chapelville, Thrasher, Hobo Station, Frankstown and Kirkville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
